Metadata/Items/Gems/SkillGemRighteousFir.name: Righteous Fire
Metadata/Items/Gems/SkillGemRighteousFir.description: Burns enemies around you while burning yourself.

Metadata/Items/Gems/SkillGemEssenceDrain.name: Essence Drain
